maml:description.maml:para: Get Firmware from IGEL Device.
Get Firmware from IGEL Device via SSH Connection. Requires Module Posh-SSH.
Get update configuration details from IGEL Device.
Get update configuration details from IGEL Device with firmware 10+ via SSH Connection. Requires Module Posh-SSH.

command:example.maml:title: -------------------------- Example 1 --------------------------
command:example.dev:code:
$Params = @{ SSHSession = New-SSHSession -ComputerName $ComputerName -Credential (Get-Credential) -AcceptKey } Get-OSUpdateConfiguration @Params
Host : TC012345 Protocol : http Hostname : igelrmserver.acme.org Port : 9080 Username : igelums Password : 00a3439e23423e182e5c2g Path : ums_filetransfer/IGEL_Universal_Desktop_LX-10.03.570

maml:description.maml:para: Get Wifi connection details from IGEL Device.
Get Wifi connection details from IGEL Device via SSH Connection. Requires Module Posh-SSH.

command:example.maml:title: -------------------------- Example 1 --------------------------
command:example.dev:code:
$Params = @{ SHSSession = New-SSHSession -ComputerName $ComputerName -Credential (Get-Credential) -AcceptKey Interface = 'wlan0' } Get-OSWifiConnection @Params
Host : TC012345 Interface : wlan0 ESSID : WLAN12345 Mode : Managed Frequency : 5.54 AccessPoint : E8:C8:C7:AD:DA:B8 BitRate : 6 TxPower : 26 LinkQuality : 56/70 SignalLevel : -54

maml:description.maml:para: Get Files.
Get Files from UMS DB via Invoke-SQLcmd2.

maml:Description.maml:para: Specifies A PSCredential for SQL Server Authentication connection to an instance of the Database Engine. If -Credential is not specified, Invoke-Sqlcmd attempts a Windows Authentication connection using the Windows account running the PowerShell session.

Specifies A PSCredential for SQL Server Authentication connection to an instance of the Database Engine. If -Credential is not specified, Invoke-Sqlcmd attempts a Windows Authentication connection using the Windows account running the PowerShell session.

command:example.dev:code:
$Params = @{ Credential = Get-Credential ServerInstance = 'SQLSERVER\RMDB' Database = 'RMDB' Schema = 'igelums' } Get-UMSFile @Params
FILEID : 25283 FILEURL : https://${serverhostname:port}$/ums_filetransfer/Certificate.cer TCURL : CLASSIFICATION : 25 MD5 : 250D3D6EB54DC8DA9019011032837E8G MD5Date : 02.05.2018 08:51:28 USERNAME : PASSWORD : OWNER : user PERMISSION : rwx--- FILE_HIDDEN : 0 MOVEDTOBIN : DIRID :
FILEID : 35196 FILEURL : https://${serverhostname:port}$/ums_filetransfer/99wlan TCURL : /etc/NetworkManager/dispatcher.d CLASSIFICATION : 0 MD5 : 7ED6277D54B8E4EAE913F0BD5E8ECCA7 MD5Date : 05.06.2018 10:44:56 USERNAME : PASSWORD : OWNER : root PERMISSION : rwxr-x FILE_HIDDEN : 0 MOVEDTOBIN : : 0 MOVEDTOBIN : DIRID : 50194

id type -- ---- 4108 tc 4110 tc 4112 tc 4114 tc

command:example.dev:code:
$Computername = 'igelrmserver' $Params = @{ Computername = $Computername WebSession = New-UMSAPICookie -Computername $Computername Details = 'full' } Get-UMSDevice @Params
unitID : 00E0C5163C78 mac : 00E0C5163C78 firmwareID : 8 networkName : TC012345 site : department : lastIP : 10.20.4.102 comment : assetID : inserviceDate : serialNumber : productId : UD3-LX 50ac umsStructuralTag : cpuSpeed : 1200 cpuType : AMD GX-412HC SOC with Radeon(TM) R3E Graphics deviceType : IGEL M340C deviceSerialNumber : 14D3E5C02B17171B64M osType : IGEL Linux V5 (Kernel Version 4.4.83) flashSize : 2048 memorySize : 1717 graphicsChipset0 : ATI MULLINS graphicsChipset1 : monitorVendor1 : Samsung Electric Company monitorModel1 : S22E450 monitorSerialnumber1 : H4LJ201900 monitorSize1 : 21,9 monitorNativeResolution1 : 1680 x 1050 monitor1YearOfManufacture : 2017 monitor1WeekOfManufacture : 7 monitorVendor2 : monitorModel2 : monitorSerialnumber2 : monitorSize2 : 0,0 monitorNativeResolution2 : monitor2YearOfManufacture : monitor2WeekOfManufacture : biosVendor : Insyde Corp. biosVersion : M340C V:3.4.13-02032016 biosDate : 02/03/2016 totalUsagetime : 2105515000 totalUptime : 36000 lastBoottime : 2018-11-12 08:01 batteryLevel : -1 id : 2515 name : TC012345 parentID : 203 movedToBin : False objectType : tc links : {}

maml:description.maml:para: Resets all thin clients listed in the request body to factory defaults and removes them from the UMS completely (without recycle bin).
Resets all thin clients listed in the request body to factory defaults and removes them from the UMS completely (without recycle bin).

maml:description.maml:para: Update Job Startdate in UMS-DB
Update Job Startdate in UMS-DB

maml:Description.maml:para: Specifies A PSCredential for SQL Server Authentication connection to an instance of the Database Engine. If -Credential is not specified, Invoke-Sqlcmd attempts a Windows Authentication connection using the Windows account running the PowerShell session.
Shows what would happen if the cmdlet runs. The cmdlet is not run.
Prompts you for confirmation before running the cmdlet.

Specifies A PSCredential for SQL Server Authentication connection to an instance of the Database Engine. If -Credential is not specified, Invoke-Sqlcmd attempts a Windows Authentication connection using the Windows account running the PowerShell session.
Shows what would happen if the cmdlet runs. The cmdlet is not run.
Prompts you for confirmation before running the cmdlet.

command:example.maml:title: -------------------------- Example 1 --------------------------
command:example.dev:code:
$Params = @{ ServerInstance = 'SQLSERVER\RMDB' Database = 'RMDB' Schema = 'igelums' Credential = (Get-Credential) JobIDColl = 18701 Startdate = '2018-01-10 00:06:41' } Update-UMSJobStartDate @Params
message ------- 1 asssignments successfully assigned

dev:remarks.maml:para: Update Job Startdate on Job with ID "18701"
Update Job Startdate on Jobs with ID "18701" and "18706"

maml:description.maml:para: Assigns a profile to a Device or a Device directory.
Assigns a profile to a Device or a tDevice directory.

command:example.maml:title: -------------------------- Example 1 --------------------------
command:example.dev:code:
$Params = @{ $WebSession = New-UMSAPICookie -Computername 'igelrmserver' $Computername = 'igelrmserver' $WebSession = $WebSession $ProfileID = 470 $TCID = 48426 } Update-UMSProfileAssignment @Params
message ------- 1 asssignments successfully assigned

dev:remarks.maml:para: Assigns the profile with ProfilID 470 to thin client with TCID 48426.
Assigns the profile with ProfileID 471 to thin client directory with DirID 300'

command:example.maml:title: -------------------------- Example 1 --------------------------
command:example.dev:code:
$Computername = 'igelrmserver' $Params = @{ Computername = 'igelrmserver' TCID = 100 Name = 'TC012345' ParentID = '772' Site = 'Leipzig' Department = 'Marketing' CostCenter = '50100' LastIP = '192.168.0.10' Comment = 'New Device' AssetID = '012345' InserviceDate = '01.01.2018' SerialNumber = '12A3B4C56B12345A6BC' } Update-UMSDevice @Params
message ------- Update successful

dev:remarks.maml:para: Updates device with all possible attributes.
Removes comment of the device to TC030564.
Upates name of the device to TC030564.
